title: Fairbanks Meetup This Sunday
summary:
Key ideas:
- Scott is announcing a meetup in Fairbanks, Alaska.
- The meetup is open to anyone who wants to attend, regardless of whether they are an SSC reader or not.
- There is no specific organizer for the meetup, but Scott will answer any questions in the comments.

Key learnings:
- Meetups can be organized by anyone, including authors of blogs.
- Offline gatherings of like-minded individuals can be a positive and enriching experience.

Key questions:
- Who will attend the meetup?
- Will there be any problems with organizing the meetup without a designated organizer? 
- Will more meetups be organized in the future?
